inclusion.criterion: HIV coinfection during IFN-based or IFN-free antiviral therapy for HCV infection
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients achieving SVR, defined as undetectable serum HCV RNA at week 12 off-therapy
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Poor access to sites for venipuncture
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 55-year-old man with HCV and HBV coinfection, on IFN, RBV and direct antiviral drugs. No other medical conditions or medications.
